product_name: Seattle Sports DryDoc Coiled Lanyard - Package of 4
long_description: Use these heavy-duty, convenient Seattle Sports DryDoc coiled lanyards to secure your DryDoc case (sold separately) to a pack, jacket or belt to help ensure you never lose your phone or camera. Besides DryDoc cases, these lanyards securely tether other items such as keys, flashlights, fishing licenses and two-way radios. Seattle Sports DryDoc coiled lanyards come in a package of four with two sizes: 2.75 in. (15 in. stretched) and 5.5 in. (30 in. stretched).
short_description: Use these heavy-duty, convenient Seattle Sports DryDoc coiled lanyards to secure your DryDoc case (sold separately) to a pack, jacket or belt to help ensure you never lose your phone or camera.
